page.title: 18HETTON SWIMMING BATHS
page.content: Hetton Swimming baths were erected in 1970 and are situated in the town centre. It comprises a{25 metre pool, {teaching pool}and cafeteria. A modern sauna suite was built as an annex to the baths in 1974. Presently, 17 staff are employed in the whole complex. The pools are used by all age groups and are extremely popular especially in the school holidays. People travel from the neighbouring area to the facilities. To keep the children entertained there are giant inflatables.{Swimming Clubs}exist for {chidren, adults}and{old age {pensioners.}One memorable occasion was when the "Swim along with Wilkie" event took place. Changes hoped for in the future include the provision of a keep fit room and a sports hall.
